CustomField.defaultValue: "Make sure you have selected the correct contact based on service/delivery location. Best Practice would be to associate the contact to the account, prior to creating the sales order. If you need the product/service to arrive at another location, overwrite the shipping address information as needed to ensure proper delivery. Once you have selected a DELIVERY CONTACT, and you wish to overwrite the SHIPPING ADDRESS on the sales order, click the new button at the top labeled, [Update Address]."
CustomField.label: Deliver To Warning Message
